articles.title: Bitcoin Surges Past $70,000 as Institutional Adoption Accelerates
articles.summary: Bitcoin has reached a new all-time high, breaking the $70,000 mark amid increased institutional investment and growing mainstream acceptance.

articles.title: Ethereum 2.0 Upgrade Completes Final Testnet, Mainnet Launch Imminent
articles.summary: The long-awaited Ethereum 2.0 upgrade has successfully completed its final testnet phase, with the mainnet launch expected within weeks.

articles.title: SEC Approves First Spot Cryptocurrency ETF in Landmark Decision
articles.summary: In a historic move, the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission has approved the first spot cryptocurrency ETF, opening doors for broader market participation.

articles.title: DeFi Protocol Aave Launches V3 with Enhanced Security Features
articles.summary: Aave, a leading DeFi lending protocol, has launched its V3 upgrade with improved security measures and new features to attract more users.

articles.title: Central Bank Digital Currencies: China Expands Digital Yuan Trials to 20 Cities
articles.summary: China has expanded its digital yuan trials to 20 major cities, signaling a significant step towards the nationwide adoption of its central bank digital currency.
